====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|無銘|むめい}}
* {{ja-r|太刀銘|たちめい}}

* {{ja-r|折り返し銘|おりかえしめい}}
* {{ja-r|額銘|がくめい}}: (''swords'') an [[inscription]] where a blade is shortened and a rectangular metal piece bearing the original inscription is cut out from the removed portion and [[embed]]ded in the new [[tang]]
